title: Alpha Admirer

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - You may propose to a player during the day.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If they accept your proposal, both of your roles will be revealed and you will become lovers.
- If they decline your proposal, it will be publicly announced that your proposal failed.
- Once you have a lover, you cannot propose to anyone else.
- Ability Uses: 1

desc:
Post 3845
*Public announcement roles in my Town? Preposterous!*
